problems.title: Triplets with Prime Sum
problems.description:
Given an integer N, count the number of triplets (i, j, k) such that 1 <= i < j < k <= N and (i + j + k) is a prime number.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
A single integer representing the count.
hintsList: Use three nested loops for i, j, and k with i < j < k.
Write a helper function to check if a number is prime.
